experts.name: Dr. Sarah Wilson
experts.title: Senior Cyber Security Analyst
experts.bio: Former cybersecurity head at multinational bank. Specialized in financial fraud prevention. Certified Ethical Hacker (CEH) and CISSP certified.

experts.name: Alex Johnson
experts.title: Digital Forensics Specialist
experts.bio: Certified digital forensics expert. Worked with law enforcement on cyber crime cases. Specialized in cryptocurrency fraud investigation.

experts.name: Priya Sharma
experts.title: Cyber Crime Legal Advisor
experts.bio: Practicing cyber law attorney. Helped draft cyber crime policies for government. Provides free legal aid to women cyber crime victims.

experts.name: Mike Chen
experts.title: Social Media Security Expert
experts.bio: Former social media platform security team member. Expert in account recovery across all major platforms. Conducts school cyber safety workshops.

experts.name: Rajesh Kumar
experts.title: Financial Fraud Investigator
experts.bio: Bank fraud investigation department veteran. Recovered millions in fraud cases. Specialized in real-time transaction tracing and freezing.

experts.name: Ananya Patel
experts.title: Women's Cyber Safety Expert
experts.bio: Dedicated to women's cyber safety. Runs nationwide awareness workshops. Provides emotional support along with technical solutions.

experts.name: Vikram Singh
experts.title: Mobile Security Specialist
experts.bio: Mobile security researcher. Specialized in Android/iOS security. Helps remove malware and secure mobile devices from threats.

experts.name: Neha Gupta
experts.title: Child Online Safety Expert
experts.bio: Child psychologist specializing in online safety. Works with schools and parents to create safe digital environments for children.

experts.name: Arun Mehta
experts.title: Corporate Security Consultant
experts.bio: Corporate security consultant for Fortune 500 companies. Specialized in preventing data breaches and securing enterprise networks.

experts.name: Sneha Reddy
experts.title: Online Shopping Fraud Specialist
experts.bio: Former e-commerce platform fraud investigator. Expert in online shopping frauds and payment gateway issues. Fluent in multiple Indian languages.
